name: @amzn/monorepo-language-servers
description: A monorepo for Language Servers for AWS

scripts.lint: eslint app/ chat-client/ client/ core/ script/ server/ --ext .ts,.tsx --ignore-path .gitignore && prettier --check .
scripts.precompile: npm run precompile --workspaces --if-present && npm run compile:core
scripts.compile: tsc --build --verbose && npm run compile:core && npm run compile:servers && npm run compile:rest
scripts.compile:core: npm run compile --workspace=core --if-present && npm run build --workspace=core --if-present
scripts.compile:rest: npm run compile --workspace app --workspace client --workspace chat-client --if-present
scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run test --workspaces --if-present
scripts.test-integ: npm run compile && npm run test-integ --workspaces --if-present
scripts.test-unit: npm run compile && npm run test-unit --workspaces --if-present
scripts.package: npm run compile && npm run package --workspaces --if-present
